com.facebook.react.uimanager

Class BaseViewManager<T extends android.view.View,C extends LayoutShadowNode>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseJavaModule
      • com.facebook.react.uimanager.ViewManager<T,C>
        • com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager<T,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NativeModule, BaseViewManagerInterface<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ARTSurfaceViewManager, ReactProgressBarViewManager, ReactTextAnchorViewManager, ReactTextInputManager, ReactVirtualTextViewManager, SimpleViewManager, ViewGroupManager

    public abstract class BaseViewManager<T extends android.view.View,C extends LayoutShadowNode>
extends ViewManager<T,C>
implements BaseViewManagerInterface<T>
    Base class that should be suitable for the majority of subclasses of ViewManager. It provides support for base view properties such as backgroundColor, opacity, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.facebook.react.bridge.NativeModule

      • onAfterUpdateTransaction

        protected void onAfterUpdateTransaction(T view)
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        Callback that will be triggered after all properties are updated in current update transaction (all @ReactProp handlers for properties updated in current transaction have been called). If you want to override this method you should call super.onAfterUpdateTransaction from it as the parent class of the ViewManager may rely on callback being executed.
        Overrides:
        onAfterUpdateTransaction in class ViewManager<T extends android.view.View,C extends LayoutShadowNode>

      • getExportedCustomDirectEventTypeConstants

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getExportedCustomDirectEventTypeConstants()
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        Returns a map of config data passed to JS that defines eligible events that can be placed on native views. This should return non-bubbling directly-dispatched event types.

        Returned map should be of the form: 

         {
   "onTwirl": {
     "registrationName": "onTwirl"
   }
 }
        Overrides:
        getExportedCustomDirectEventTypeConstants in class ViewManager<T extends android.view.View,C extends LayoutShadowNode>
